typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 select(mapColumn(
		MOVIE_ID = movie,
		MOVIE_NAME = title,
		MOVIE_GENRES = genres,
		YEAR_OF_RELEASE = year,
		ROTTEN_TOMATO = {Rotton Tomato}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 filter(toInteger(ROTTEN_TOMATO)>80) ~> Filter1
Filter1 derive(PRIMARY_GENRE = iif(locate("|",MOVIE_GENRES) > 1,left(MOVIE_GENRES, locate("|",MOVIE_GENRES)-1),MOVIE_GENRES)) ~> SplittingMovieGenres
